mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.product_name AS "productName", a.category_name AS "categoryName", a.conclusion, a.report_count AS "reportCount", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.is_activate AS "isActivate" FROM ec_activity_feedback a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_activity_feedback( id, title, product_name, category_name, conclusion, report_count, create_date, is_activate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{productName}, #{categoryName}, #{conclusion}, #{reportCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0 )
INSERT INTO ec_activity_stat_answer VALUES ( REPLACE(CAST(UUID() as char character set utf8), '-', ''), #{statisticsId}, #{answer}, #{count} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ec_activity_stat_answer WHERE statistics_id in (SELECT id FROM ec_activity_stat WHERE feedback_id = #{id})
